content: उत्क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्-स्वार्थे कन्; उत्कः = उ. त्कंठितः; उत्क उन्मनाः <ls>P. V. 2. 80</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>] {@--1@} Desirous of, longing for, anxiously wishing for (in <ab>comp.</ab>); अद्रिसुतासमागमोत्कः <ls>Ku. 6. 95</ls>; मानसोत्काः <ls>Me. 11</ls>; sometimes with an <ab>inf.</ab>; <ls>Śi. 4. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Regretting, sad, sorrowful. {@--3@} Absent-minded. --त्कः {@--1@} Desire. {@--2@} Opportunity.
